title: Are the Salem Witch Trials Part of Women’s History?
description: An exhibition at the New-York Historical Society gives the dark events a fresh look.
dc:creator: Laurel Graeber
category: The Salem Witch Trials: Reckoning and Reclaiming (Exhibit)
media:credit: Jeenah Moon for The New York Times
media:description: David Teniers II’s “Incantation Scene” (1650-1690) anchors a display in “The Salem Witch Trials: Reckoning and Reclaiming,” along with two 17th-century books about witchcraft from the New-York Historical Society’s collection. The exhibition will be on view through Jan. 22.
